# social-media-node.js-apis

![This is a alt text.](data:image/jpeg;base64, "This is a sample image.")

> Social media is a backend project built on NodeJs/Express Restful APIs

## Features
> CRUD (Create, Read, Update And Delete)

* Authentication with JWT

```
Login (User/Admin)
Register
```

* Users

```
Add a User 
Delete a Userst
List Timline Posts
Like and Dis Like Post
Retrieve a Single Post Details
```

* Posts

```
Create a Post 
Update Post
Retrieve a Single User Details
Follow And Unfollow
```

> API Security

* HTTP Secure Headers with helmet


## Requirement

* NodeJS
* MongoDB


## Environment Variables

just add a .env file in config/config.env and fill it with your keys

```
PORT=
MONGO_URI=
```

## installation
```
npm install 
```

### Start web server
```
npm start
```
